creator: crikelyn@vdab.be
text:
with javadoc you can define your own taglets, e.g.

javadoc 
  -tagletpath ./classes 
  -sourcepath ./src 
  -taglet be.vdab.foundation.taglet.ToDoTaglet 
  -taglet be.vdab.foundation.taglet.PreconditionTaglet 
  -taglet be.vdab.foundation.taglet.PostconditionTaglet 
  be.vdab.foundation.http

But the javadoc task has no support for taglets. Will it be done in the next 
release of ant?
